autoattack.midnightconfig.title: AutoAttack Config
autoattack.midnightconfig.text1: Auto Attack makes it so that holding the attack button autoswings the sword
autoattack.midnightconfig.checkUpdate: Check for a new mod update
autoattack.midnightconfig.preventsHittin: Prevents you from hitting blocks in all tools
Prevents you from hitting blocks only in swords
autoattack.midnightconfig.cleanCut: Attack enemies through obstructions (similar to CleanCut Mod)
text.KeyBindingConfig.preventsHittingBlo: Prevents hitting blocks in all tools OFF!
Prevents hitting blocks in all tools ON!
